title: Heartfelt wishes pour in for chairman PCP following heart surgery
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 16 (APP):Minister for Information, Broadcasting, National Heritage and Culture Attaullah Tarar, Minister for Law and Justice Azam Nazeer Tarar and several prominent figures have sent bouquets and expressed their well wishes to Chairman of the Press Council of Pakistan (PCP), Arshad Khan Jadoon, following his heart surgery.
In his message, Minister for Information Attaullah Tarar extended his heartfelt prayers for Jadoonâ€™s speedy recovery. He prayed to Allah Almighty for his swift healing and return to full health.
Arshad Khan Jadoon underwent heart surgery last week at the Armed Forces Institute of Cardiology (AFIC) in Rawalpindi. Well-wishers have expressed their support and hope for his quick recovery during this challenging time.
